Name: ectopic Cushing syndrome
Definition: A primary hyperaldosteronism that is characterized by a tumor outside the pituitary gland produces a hormone called adrenocorticotropic hormone.

Name: glucocorticoid-remediable aldosteronism
Definition: A malaria that involves neurologic damage resulting from blockage of the blood vessels
Synonym: Nystagmus associated with disorder of the vestibular system
